com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb

Class BDBLastAccessStore<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.LastAccessStore<K,E>
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb.BDBLastAccessStore<K,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStoppable

    public abstract class BDBLastAccessStore<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>
extends LastAccessStore<K,E>
    Intermediate base class for BDB-JE - backed LastAccessStore implementation.

      • hasEfficientEntryCount

        public boolean hasEfficientEntryCount()
        Description copied from class: LastAccessStore
        Method for checking whether link LastAccessStore.getEntryCount() has a method to produce entry count using a method that is more efficient than explicitly iterating over entries. Note that even if true is returned, some amount of iteration may be required, and operation may still be more expensive than per-entry access.
        Specified by:
        hasEfficientEntryCount in class LastAccessStore<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>
